chatSystemController

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chatSystemController.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Thread
    The controller is the only one who can update the different models. It directly controls the chatNI but not the ChatGUI (it is done by update messages)
    Author:
    joanna
